ExternalData.Titlesect: United Nations Convention on the Use of Electronic Communications in International Contracts

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations,Treaty Series,vol. 2898United Nations,Treaty Series, Doc. A/60/515.

TreatyNote.Text: The above Convention was adopted on 23 November 2005 during the 53rd plenary meeting of the General Assembly by resolution A/60/21. In accordance with its article 16, the Convention shall be open for signature by all States from 16 January 2006 to 16 January 2008 at United Nations Headquarters in New York.
